item.title: M4
item.description: This was a client project I got some time back. The relationship with the client was a strange once, and it wouldnâ€™t make sense to comment further as I think the whole experience itself was something else. I was no angel myself, but what I took away from it was a lot more than a new monitor. The first piece - the receiver - was easily the hardest. The bug mistakes were:
